name: Dropship Sell Your Art
author: Aarush Malik

sections.description: Start selling your photos in framed canvas, posters, flags etc. without inventory. Use dropshipping for selling your art on demand. Currently printful is supported. Selling your artwork cannot be easier. You have to maintain no inventory, no need to learn how to do dropshipping, and just decide your profit/price of art and go!
sections.installation:
1. Download and unzip Dropship Sell Your Art plugin
  2. Upload the entire directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the Dropship Sell Your Art plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress

  4. Insert your API keys through Printful -> Settings (We support Printful only at this time). Printful is used for drop shipping.

  5. Insert your Stripe API keys through Dropship -> Settings (We support Stripe only at this time). Stripe is used to get money from your customer to your bank account.
  6. Use our unique shortcodes to display your art anywhere.
sections.faq:
Q: How do I get my Printful API Token?

A: Go to https://developers.printful.com/ and click create Private Token.

Q: How do I change my Printful API Token?

A: You can remove your Printful API Token at any time, and use another Token. Go to settings and click Disconnect Store.

Q: How do I get my Stripe API Key?

A: Create a new account on stripe.com and then get the API Keys

Q: How do I display my art for sale in any page?

A: We’ve made it incredibly to display your art anywhere on your website. Simply use the [canvas_prints_image_gallery] shortcode. You can specify the amount of columns/rows you wish to display using the columns/row attributes like: [canvas_prints_image_gallery rows=3 columns=3].

Q: Is there a limit on how much I can sell?

A: No! There is no limit. Sell as much as you want.
